author: bodewig
msg: "Finally I managed to finish a new version of the VAJ tasks. The most
important new feature is the ability to execute VAJ tasks from the
command line by exploiting the Remote Tool Access feature of VAJ."
Some patches look a lot larger as I had to remove stray CRs, I also
killed TABs wherever I stumbled over them.

author: donaldp
msg: A fix to make the cleanUp method do full cleanup.

author: bodewig
msg: Only override subbuild's basedir if inheritall has been set to false.
Get rid of annoying warning that <property> has been redefined in

author: bodewig
msg: make sure <propertyfile> closes the file it's been reading from.
